SAINT.Name: Venerable Chariton the Confessor, Abbot of Palestine (+c.350)
Martyrs Alexander, Altheos, Zosimas, Mark the Shepherd, Nikon, Neonos, Helioldoros, Stephen, another Mark and 24 others in Pisidia and Phrygia (4th C)
Martyrdom of Saint Wenceslaus (Vyacheslav), Prince of the Czech Lands (+935)
Venerable Schema-Monk Cyril and the Schema-Nun Maria the parents of the Venerable Sergius of Radonezh
